'''1.17.34''' is a hotfix to {{el|be}} released on October 5–7, 2021, which fixes a bug with redeeming codes.<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/4410708945293-Minecraft-1-17-34-Bedrock-|title=Minecraft - 1.17.34 (Bedrock)|website=feedback.minecraft.net|date=October 5, 2021}}</ref> This version is still compatible with all Bedrock platforms running on [[Bedrock Edition 1.17.30|1.17.30]] until [[Bedrock Edition 1.17.33|1.17.33]].

== Fixes ==
* Fixed an issue with owned content not appearing in the inventory after redeeming a retail code.
